title: Father of the bride. Part II
creator_credit: Touchstone Pictures, Nancy Meyers and Charles Shyer
brief_description: In this sequel to “Father of the bride” (199), itself a remake of the 1950 Vincente Minnelli film starring Elizabeth Taylor, Steve Martin reprises his role as George Banks. This time the hapless George must face becoming a grandfather, (news which triggers a mid-life crisis). along with the alarming fact that he is to be a father again. Cast includes Diane Keaton, Martin Short, Kimberly Williams, George Newbern, Kieran Culkin.
